game.name: Cut The Rope Experiments
game.description:
Take charge to help the cute frog Om Nomto feed the maximum possible candy! In this extremely popular free online game ? Cut the Rope Experiments, your goal is to cut the rope you have not done before. Everything right from helping the cute frog to eat their favorite candy to assisting him to deal with various kinds of obstacles on his way you love. This exciting cool flash game features new gameplay and fantastic graphics! With more than 200 levels, candies for Om Nom to eat - you will have a lot to be explored in this exclusively-designed online game.?

The little green and cute monster Om Nom is back with new gameplay and cool graphics. He is so hungry and passionate to achieve his mission! Give your helping hands to the Professor, a mad scientist who is highly concentrated to analyze and research the Om Nom candy-loving behavior right through the finest range of series of experiments. In this cool flash game for kids, you will have to use suction cups as well as other funny and useful devices in order to gather shiny gold stars. Do not forget to unlock the hidden prizes and encourage yourself to move to the advanced levels in this popular free arcade.

In this rope cutting frenzy game, you are sure to have unlimited fun and enjoyment. Do not hesitate, help the little creature to eat more food and become happiest souls on this planet. Get yourself prepared to cut some tight ropes properly and try to do this activity with perfect timing so that more candies will fall into the mouth of your cut frog. All the best to clear all the levels and gather the maximum possible stars to achieve the maximum possible score! Good luck and huge great fun!
